condition.comment: The Player hired Haruka Mimieux. The Player made it to the hospital with Haruka and Sebastian.
condition.narration: Madame Soleil stares into the night sky. A Doctor, from the delivery room, bows to her.
condition.line: Mrs. Mimieux would like to see you.
condition.narration: Soleil, shivering and giggling, rushes into the delivery room. Sebastian breaks from his wife's hand to look on. She hugs Sebastian.
condition.line: I didn't expect anyone in this land to have children this year.
Just because my wife wanted you here doesn't mean I do.
condition.narration: Zoom out.Haruka, in the bed, looks up.
Exclusively in ring is the sound of white noises. Soleil nears Haruka. Unprovoked. Soleil provides no cue to near Haruka.Haruka struggles to lift her arm inches above the bed.

choice.comment: The Player decided to go by car.
choice.line: I wanna move, but I'm too weak.

choice.comment: The Player decided to walk the whole time.
choice.line: I wanna walk, but I'm too weak.

condition.line: There ain't much to do when they've got the kid.
I wanna move, I wanna move.
condition.narration: Haruka pants. Sebastian takes from his pocket a handheld.
condition.line: You brought something with lots of running and jumping, right?
I can play for a minute or two. Just until the doctors come.
condition.narration: Haruka attempts to hold the handheld steady. Sebastian gazes at Haruka and the device.
condition.line: You should be up and running everywhere soon.
We won't have to nip at your hunger with fake food.
condition.narration: In walks a person in a real labcoat. It is Asami.
condition.line: Fell asleep with want to sprint?
condition.narration: The person in the fake labcoat turns around. It's Soleil!
Asami runs to stone-faced Soleil and hugs her and kisses her and buries her head in her shoulders. Soleil pats her on the back.
condition.line: Daughter, I'm a real doctor now. I'm real!
Did you see the flowers I planted out front?
condition.narration: Asami shivers. She stares up into her daughter's eyes.
condition.line: The lavender! Please tell me you like it, please!
Asami, why not ditch the delivery room and come work for me?
For a while, I'm Sega's Vice President—
condition.comment: Musician Asami Takeshi is now on the development team.
